definitions.definition: An early portable computer , similar to a desktop computer.
An early portable computer , heavier than the modern laptop .
A portable computer that can be easily carried and moved, but cannot easily be used during travel.

main_definition: ( computing , dated ) An early portable computer , similar to a desktop computer.
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) An early portable computer , heavier than the modern laptop .
( computing ) A portable computer that can be easily carried and moved, but cannot easily be used during travel.
